mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_product( product_id, product_name, unit_price, freight, product_type, description, status, create_time ) VALUES ( #{productId, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{freight, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{productType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
